details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.10 Fonts - 6.2.10.6 Character encodings - cmaps for non-symbolic TrueType fonts
details.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain at least Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1), or Macintosh Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=0) 'cmap' subtable that all necessary glyph lookups are able to be carried out.

rule.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain at least Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1), or Macintosh Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=0) 'cmap' subtable that all necessary glyph lookups are able to be carried out.
rule.test: isSymbolic == true || cmap31Present == true || cmap10Present == true

error.message: The embedded font program for a non-symbolic TrueType font does not contain contain Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) or the Mac Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=0) encoding.
